scenario.name: new_script
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[call_number] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, INFO Subject: cgg_test_wout_100_rel Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=student 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Subject: cgg_test_wout_100_rel Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "[service]" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[call_number] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>[peer_tag_param] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: cgg_test_wout_100_rel Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Subject: cgg_test_wout_100_rel Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[call_number] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> [authentication] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: cgg_test_wout_100_rel Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=student 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
